Name: Spencer Horn
Title: Senior QA Specialist
About:
I grew up in Southern California just two miles from the ocean where I spent any free time I had at the beach; mostly in the water. My first love was the ocean but as I grew a bit older a new passion emerged - technology. In my early teens I had a dedicated phone line installed in my room to run a BBS and practice ANSI art. Later I discovered HTML and began developing web pages for small companies in the area. I had a strong appetite for information that was only temporarily satiated by learning something new.

Now as an adult, that curiosity and hunger is still very much alive. At Smashing Boxes, I am able to indulge my passion by ensuring the products we create are both beautiful and functional, exceeding the highest standards for software quality. 

My broad-based skill set extends beyond technology as well. In my personal time I enjoy woodworking, crocheting, smoking fine meats and brewing delicious libations. You wouldn't be surprised to find me at a Bulls game or hiking the Eno river with my family.
